job_tasks.phrase: You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a role in designing and leading the development of applications that are driven by AI, which falls under the umbrella of integrating AI into software.

job_tasks.phrase: An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights traditional software engineering concerns of security, scalability, and repeatability, which are crucial for integrating AI into production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
job_tasks.justification: Improving the ML lifecycle often involves integrating ML models into broader software development processes and workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: These are core software engineering practices essential for building and maintaining reliable applications, including those with AI components.

job_tasks.phrase: Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the software engineering aspect of ensuring applications are secure and compliant, a key part of integration.

job_tasks.phrase: If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the role involves an overlap of AI with Software and Data Engineering, pointing towards an integrated role.

job_tasks.phrase: We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the core of the work involves using and developing applications with LLMs, which falls under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
job_tasks.justification: This task directly involves using LLM agentic frameworks like Langchain and Langgraph to build a specific application, which is a key aspect of GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
job_tasks.justification: Bringing AI models to production, especially as APIs, is a core software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining ML infrastructure is a key MLOps responsibility, crucial for deploying and managing AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the focus on software development practices (CI/CD, code quality, testing, monitoring) for AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the business impact and strategic alignment of the ML solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the role's contribution to business value creation through AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job.
job_tasks.justification: This points to the strategic aspect of upskilling the team and sharing knowledge to drive business value.

job_tasks.phrase: The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a strategic goal of improving team capabilities and aligning with best practices for business benefit.

job_tasks.phrase: Our ambition is to become even better at AI.
job_tasks.justification: This reflects a strategic business ambition related to AI.

soft_skills.phrase: knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job.
soft_skills.justification: This directly refers to knowledge transfer and coaching, which are key communication and collaboration activities.

soft_skills.phrase: The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.
soft_skills.justification: This implies a collaborative effort to upskill colleagues and share best practices.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with colleagues is a clear indicator of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be working in our Competence Center, where we work on applications for the business through projects. Your team includes several data scientists and a machine learning engineer. You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer. We also work with various end-to-end teams, all of which exchange specialist knowledge. In this way, we work very efficiently on scalable solutions. In this process, we learn a lot from each other.
soft_skills.justification: This entire section emphasizes teamwork, collaboration with various teams, and mutual learning.

soft_skills.phrase: You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications.
soft_skills.justification: Taking the lead in devising and designing applications demonstrates initiative and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility. That ensures that you continue to grow.
soft_skills.justification: Freedom and responsibility are directly linked to ownership and the opportunity for innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: With a solution-oriented and active mindset, you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights a solution-oriented and active approach to problem-solving.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly indicates a strong focus on Generative AI tasks, specifically mentioning the use of LLMs, OpenAI's GPT, and frameworks like Langchain and Langgraph for developing applications like email response generation. It also emphasizes bringing AI models to production as APIs and developing ML infrastructure, which are core software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A). The role requires a balance of these GenAI-specific tasks (Macro-Category B) and software engineering practices (Macro-Category A), fitting the definition of a 'Core GenAI Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the technologies (LLMs, Langchain, Python, Azure) and the tasks involved, which include both GenAI specialization (LLM agentic frameworks) and core software engineering practices (scalability, security, CI/CD, APIs, infrastructure). The description aligns well with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile, leaving little room for ambiguity.
